cause.description:
Help me in trying to stop animal abuse and animal testing. It really makes me angry when people test things on animals. If they have so much money from being a scientist, I think that they could come up with something that doesn't involve animals or humans in testings.
Remember: You can help animals everywhere by joining PETA's Action Team today: http://bit.ly/action-team.
1. Stop animal abuse and animal testing in labs
cause.mission: Try and stop it and figure out why people do it.
cause.name: Animal Abuse & Animal Testings
